name: Triple It!
description:
Controls are easy: -Drag and drop for placing tiles. -Hold and release for turning tiles.

#################################

Hello, My name is Kerem.

This is my first demo for "Triple It!" (I'm not sure about the name. I can change it later.) It's a casual/puzzle mobile game that you can combine three or more same valued tiles to make more valued tiles and get more score. If you combine fives it also combines the tiles nearby itself.

I'm just interested in coding and I don't have any art skills, so in demo there is no remarkable things about art. If you want to help me about this you can contact me freely.  (Contact info is in my account.)

Hope you enjoy! Please consider to comment about anything you want.
